results.content: Love how this course made me grown up in magnificent ways
results.content_html: Love how this course made me grown up in magnificent ways

results.content: I mainly got this course for the section on hooks, and redux, and I must say this guy did an amazing job teaching both. I've taken plenty big name courses trying to get a better understanding of Redux, and this instructor nailed it. I feel so confident using Redux now with hooks. Thank you! If there was one recommendation to add to the course, I would say to teach us how to use Redux without hooks. The traditional way, because I know there are a ton of apps we'll come across that are still using the traditional setup with connect, mapStateToProps, etc. Outstanding course with great project examples and explanations.

response.content:
Thanks Eagans
Redux with traditional way (Class components) will be added soon.
Happy Coding :)
response.content_html:
